title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 60.5 - Odometers with numbered wheels
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 60.5 - Odometers with numbered wheels

State Regulations

Odometers which use numbered wheels to display miles or
kilometers traveled must not permit alteration by manipulation with picks, screwdrivers or other tools, except in the following circumstances: (a) after the odometer is removed from the
instrument panel; or
(b) after
visually apparent altering of the odometer reading or breakage of the structure
surrounding the odometer assembly. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
60.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
